Ebenezer Stevens bill of lading for the sloop Minerva
Stevens, Ebenezer, 1751-1823
AHMC – Stevens, Ebenezer
1 item(s) in 1 folder.
1799 July 6 Bill of lading — "Entry of Merchandize Imported by Ebenezer Stevens in the Sloop Minerva, Captain Living, from New Orleans" — dated New York, 6 July 1799. For further details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
